trans-unit.source: Classes extending/implementing may broaden methods using array or Traversable as parameter types to iterable or narrow return types from iterable to array or Traversable.
trans-unit.target: 扩展/实现的类可以将使用array或Traversable作为参数类型的方法扩展为可迭代的方法，或者将返回类型从可迭代的范围缩小到array或Traversable。

trans-unit.source: Classes implementing Countable can be used with the count() function.
trans-unit.target: 实现Countable的类可以与count（）函数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Classes implementing OuterIterator can be used to iterate over iterators.
trans-unit.target: 实现OuterIterator的类可用于迭代迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Classes implementing RecursiveIterator can be used to iterate over iterators recursively.
trans-unit.target: 实现RecursiveIterator的类可用于递归迭代迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement this interface no longer support __sleep() and __wakeup(). The method serialize is called whenever an instance needs to be serialized. This does not invoke __destruct() or have any other side effect unless programmed inside the method. When the data is unserialized the class is known and the appropriate unserialize() method is called as a constructor instead of calling __construct(). If you need to execute the standard constructor you may do so in the method.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口的类不再支持__sleep（）和__wakeup（）。每当实例需要序列化时，都会调用serialize方法。除非在方法内部进行编程，否则这不会调用__destruct（）或产生任何其他副作用。当数据被非序列化时，该类是已知的，并且将适当的unserialize（）方法作为构造函数调用，而不是调用__construct（）。如果需要执行标准构造函数，则可以在方法中执行。

trans-unit.source: Classes which extends PDO and implements the __call magic method will now receive the method name in the declared casing. Previously this was always lower case.
trans-unit.target: 现在，扩展PDO并实现__call magic方法的类将在声明的大小写中接收方法名称。以前，这总是小写。

trans-unit.source: Classname or object (instance of the class) that contains the method.
trans-unit.target: 包含该方法的类名或对象(类的实例)。

trans-unit.source: Cleans up expired sessions. Called by session_start(), based on session.gc_divisor, session.gc_probability and session.gc_maxlifetime settings.
trans-unit.target: 清理过期的会话。由session_start（）调用，基于session.gc_divisor，session.gc_probability和session.gc_maxlifetime设置。

trans-unit.source: Cleans up expired sessions. Called randomly by PHP internally when a session starts or when session_start() is invoked. The frequency this is called is based on the session.gc_divisor and session.gc_probability configuration directives.
trans-unit.target: 清理过期的会话。当会话启动或调用session_start（）时，由PHP在内部随机调用。调用的频率基于session.gc_divisor和session.gc_probability配置指令。

trans-unit.source: Clear resources associated with a PixelIterator.
Clear the realpath and the stat cache for a specific filename only; only used if clear_realpath_cache is TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 仅清除特定文件名的实路径和状态缓存；仅在 clear_realpath_cache 为 TRUE 时使用。

trans-unit.source: Clearing keepalive status is useful when returning from Ev::run() / EvLoop::run() just because of the watcher is undesirable. It could be a long running UDP socket watcher or so.
trans-unit.target: 从Ev :: run（） / EvLoop :: run（）返回时，仅由于观察者不理想而清除keepalive状态非常有用。它可能是长时间运行的UDP套接字监视程序。

trans-unit.source: Clears (sets to 0) bit index in a. The index starts at 0.
trans-unit.target: 清零（设置为0）位 index 中 a 。索引从0开始。
清除所有当前绑定参数。

trans-unit.source: Clears all currently group-by settings, and disables group-by. This call is normally required only when using multi-queries.
trans-unit.target: 清除当前所有的分组设置,并禁用分组。通常只有在使用多查询时才需要此调用。

trans-unit.source: Clears all currently set filters. This call is normally required when using multi-queries. You might want to set different filters for different queries in the batch. To do that, you should call SphinxClient::resetFilters() and add new filters using the respective calls.
trans-unit.target: 清除所有当前设置的过滤器。使用多查询时，通常需要此调用。您可能要为批处理中的不同查询设置不同的过滤器。为此，您应该调用SphinxClient :: resetFilters（）并使用相应的调用添加新的过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Clears all resources associated to Gmagick object
trans-unit.target: 清除所有与Gmagick对象相关的资源。

trans-unit.source: Clears all resources associated to Imagick object
trans-unit.target: 清除与Imagick对象相关的所有资源

trans-unit.source: Clears all the task callback functions that have previously been set.
trans-unit.target: 清除之前设置的所有任务回调函数。

trans-unit.source: Clears either all of the fields or a specific field. A cleared field is marked as unset, giving it the lowest priority against overlapping fields or even default values when calculating the time. Additionally, its value is set to 0, though given the fieldʼs low priority, its value may have been internally set to another value by the time the field has finished been queried.
trans-unit.target: 清除所有字段或特定字段。清除的字段被标记为未设置，因此在计算时间时，相对于重叠的字段甚至是默认值，它的优先级最低。此外，尽管给定字段的优先级较低，但它的值设置为0，但在查询完该字段时，其值可能已在内部设置为另一个值。

trans-unit.source: Clears the ImagickDraw object of any accumulated commands, and resets the settings it contains to their defaults.
trans-unit.target: 清除ImagickDraw对象的所有累积命令,并将其包含的设置重置为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Clears the ImagickPixel object, leaving it in a fresh state. This also unsets any color associated with the object.
trans-unit.target: 清除ImagickPixel对象,使其处于新状态。这也会取消设置与该对象相关联的任何颜色。

trans-unit.source: Clears the most recent errors, making it unable to be retrieved with error_get_last().
trans-unit.target: 清除最近的错误，使其无法使用error_get_last（）进行检索。

trans-unit.source: Client error message numbers are listed in the MySQL <var>errmsg.h</var> header file, server error message numbers are listed in <var>mysqld_error.h</var>. In the MySQL source distribution you can find a complete list of error messages and error numbers in the file <var>Docs/mysqld_error.txt</var>.
trans-unit.target: 客户端错误消息编号在MySQL <var>errmsg.h</var> 头文件中列出，服务器错误消息编号在 <var>mysqld_error.h</var> 中列出。在MySQL源代码发行版中，您可以在文件 <var>Docs/mysqld_error.txt</var> 中找到错误消息和错误编号的完整列表。

trans-unit.source: Clips along the first path from the 8BIM profile, if present.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在的话,沿着8BIM配置文件的第一条路径进行剪辑。

trans-unit.source: Clips along the named paths from the 8BIM profile, if present. Later operations take effect inside the path. Id may be a number if preceded with #, to work on a numbered path, e.g., "#1" to use the first path.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在的话,沿着8BIM配置文件中的命名路径进行剪辑。后面的操作在路径内生效,如果前面有#,Id可以是数字,以便在有编号的路径上工作,例如,"#1 "使用第一个路径。如果前面有#,Id可以是一个数字,以便在有编号的路径上工作,例如,"#1 "使用第一个路径。

trans-unit.source: Clips along the named paths from the 8BIM profile, if present. Later operations take effect inside the path. It may be a number if preceded with #, to work on a numbered path, e.g., "#1" to use the first path.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在的话,沿着8BIM配置文件中的命名路径进行剪辑。后面的操作在路径内生效。如果前面有#,则可以是数字,以便在编号的路径上工作,例如,"#1 "表示使用第一个路径。

trans-unit.source: Clones the current ImagickDraw to create a new ImagickDraw, which is then added to the ImagickDraw stack. The original drawing ImagickDraw(s) may be returned to by invoking pop(). The ImagickDraws are stored on a ImagickDraw stack. For every Pop there must have already been an equivalent Push.
trans-unit.target: 克隆当前的ImagickDraw以创建一个新的ImagickDraw,然后将其添加到ImagickDraw堆栈中。原有的ImagickDraw可以通过调用pop()返回。ImagickDraws存储在ImagickDraw堆栈中。每一个 Pop 都必须有一个等价的 Push。

trans-unit.source: Close a connection to a remote SSH server.
trans-unit.target: 关闭与远程SSH服务器的连接。

trans-unit.source: Close opened or created archive and save changes. This method is automatically called at the end of the script.
trans-unit.target: 关闭已打开或创建的存档并保存更改。本方法在脚本结束时自动调用。

trans-unit.source: Close the sender side of the socket and include an appropriate notification of this at the end of the sent data. The sent data completes the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 关闭套接字的发送端,并在发送数据的结尾处加入适当的通知。发送的数据就完成了交易。

trans-unit.source: Closed resources are now reported as 'resource (closed)'. Previously the returned value for closed resources were 'unknown type'.
trans-unit.target: 现在，已关闭的资源被报告为“资源（已关闭）”。以前，封闭资源的返回值是'unknown type'。

trans-unit.source: Closes HTTP connection associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: 关闭与该请求相关联的HTTP连接。

trans-unit.source: Closes a cURL session and frees all resources. The cURL handle, ch, is also deleted.
trans-unit.target: 关闭cURL会话并释放所有资源。cURL句柄 ch 也将被删除。

trans-unit.source: Closes a cURL share handle and frees all resources.
trans-unit.target: 关闭一个cURL共享句柄,释放所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Closes a file pointer to a pipe opened by popen().
trans-unit.target: 关闭指向由popen（）打开的管道的文件指针。

trans-unit.source: Closes a prepared statement. mysqli_stmt_close() also deallocates the statement handle. If the current statement has pending or unread results, this function cancels them so that the next query can be executed.
trans-unit.target: 关闭准备好的语句。mysqli_stmt_close（）也取消分配语句句柄。如果当前语句具有待处理或未读的结果，则此函数将其取消，以便可以执行下一个查询。

trans-unit.source: Closes a previously opened database connection.
trans-unit.target: 关闭之前打开的数据库连接。

trans-unit.source: Closes a set of cURL handles.
Closes an open connection and releases resourses associated with the connection.
trans-unit.target: 关闭一个开放的连接并释放与该连接相关的资源。

trans-unit.source: Closes down the connection to the database server.
trans-unit.target: 关闭与数据库服务器的连接。

trans-unit.source: Closes file descriptor associated with the current buffer event.
trans-unit.target: 关闭与当前缓冲区事件相关联的文件描述符。
关闭之前打开的持久连接。

trans-unit.source: Closes the current session. This function is automatically executed when closing the session, or explicitly via session_write_close().
trans-unit.target: 关闭当前会话。该函数在关闭会话时自动执行，或通过session_write_close（）显式执行。

trans-unit.source: Closes the current session. This method is automatically executed internally by PHP when closing the session, or explicitly via session_write_close() (which first calls the SessionHandler::write()).
trans-unit.target: 关闭当前会话。此方法由PHP在关闭会话时自动在内部执行，或通过session_write_close（）（首先调用SessionHandler :: write（））显式执行。

trans-unit.source: Closes the directory stream indicated by dir_handle. The stream must have previously been opened by opendir().
trans-unit.target: 关闭由 dir_handle 指示的目录流。流必须事先由opendir（）打开。

trans-unit.source: Closes the given ZIP file archive.
Closes the given bzip2 file pointer.
Closes the input the XMLReader object is currently parsing.
trans-unit.target: 关闭XMLReader对象当前正在解析的输入。

trans-unit.source: Closes the link to an InterBase database that's associated with a connection id returned from ibase_connect(). Default transaction on link is committed, other transactions are rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 关闭与ibase_connect（）返回的连接ID关联的InterBase数据库的链接。链接上的默认事务已提交，其他事务已回滚。
Closure :: __ construct —不允许实例化的构造方法

trans-unit.source: Closure::bind — Duplicates a closure with a specific bound object and class scope
trans-unit.target: Closure :: bind —使用特定的绑定对象和类作用域复制闭包

trans-unit.source: Closure::bindTo — Duplicates the closure with a new bound object and class scope
trans-unit.target: Closure :: bindTo —使用新的绑定对象和类范围复制闭包

trans-unit.source: Closure::call — Binds and calls the closure
Closure::fromCallable — Converts a callable into a closure
trans-unit.target: Closure :: fromCallable —将可调用对象转换为闭包

trans-unit.source: Closures can also be used as the values of variables; PHP automatically converts such expressions into instances of the Closure internal class. Assigning a closure to a variable uses the same syntax as any other assignment, including the trailing semicolon:
trans-unit.target: 闭包也可以用作变量的值；PHP自动将此类表达式转换为Closure内部类的实例。将闭包分配给变量使用的语法与其他任何赋值相同，包括结尾的分号：

trans-unit.source: Closures may also inherit variables from the parent scope. Any such variables must be passed to the use language construct. From PHP 7.1, these variables must not include superglobals, $this, or variables with the same name as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 闭包也可以从父范围继承变量。任何此类变量都必须传递给使用语言构造。从PHP 7.1开始，这些变量不得包含superglobals， $this 或与参数同名的变量。

trans-unit.source: Collapse voiced sound notation and convert them into a character. Use with "K","H"
trans-unit.target: 折叠有声符号并将其转换为字符。与 "K"、"H "一起使用

trans-unit.source: Collapses the result set to a single document per group before it forwards the result set to the rest of the search components.
trans-unit.target: 在将结果集转发到搜索组件的其他部分之前,将结果集折叠为每个组的单个文档。
整理器:: __ construct —创建一个整理器

trans-unit.source: Collator::asort -- collator_asort — Sort array maintaining index association
trans-unit.target: Collat​​or :: asort-collat​​or_asort —维护索引关联的排序数组

trans-unit.source: Collator::compare -- collator_compare — Compare two Unicode strings
Collator::getAttribute -- collator_get_attribute — Get collation attribute value
Collator::getErrorCode -- collator_get_error_code — Get collator's last error code
trans-unit.target: Collat​​or :: getErrorCode-collat​​or_get_error_code —获取整理器的最后一个错误代码

trans-unit.source: Collator::getErrorMessage -- collator_get_error_message — Get text for collator's last error code
trans-unit.target: Collat​​or :: getErrorMessage-collat​​or_get_error_message —获取整理者的上一个错误代码的文本

trans-unit.source: Collator::getLocale -- collator_get_locale — Get the locale name of the collator
trans-unit.target: Collat​​or :: getLocale-collat​​or_get_locale —获取整理者的语言环境名称

trans-unit.source: Collator::getSortKey -- collator_get_sort_key — Get sorting key for a string
trans-unit.target: Collat​​or :: getSortKey-collat​​or_get_sort_key —获取字符串的排序键

trans-unit.source: Collator::getStrength -- collator_get_strength — Get current collation strength
trans-unit.target: Collat​​or :: getStrength-collat​​or_get_strength —获取当前的整理强度
Collat​​or :: setAttribute-collat​​or_set_attribute —设置排序规则属性

trans-unit.source: Collator::sort -- collator_sort — Sort array using specified collator
trans-unit.target: Collat​​or :: sort-collat​​or_sort —使用指定的排序规则对数组进行排序

trans-unit.source: Collator::sortWithSortKeys -- collator_sort_with_sort_keys — Sort array using specified collator and sort keys
trans-unit.target: Collat​​or :: sortWithSortKeys-collat​​or_sort_with_sort_keys —使用指定的排序规则和排序键对数组进行排序

trans-unit.source: Collectable::isGarbage — Determine whether an object has been marked as garbage
trans-unit.target: Collectable :: isGarbage —确定对象是否已被标记为垃圾

trans-unit.source: Collectable::setGarbage — Mark an object as garbage
trans-unit.target: Collectable :: setGarbage —将对象标记为垃圾

trans-unit.source: Column number, zero-based, to be retrieved from the result resource. Defaults to the first column if not specified.
trans-unit.target: 要从结果资源中检索的列号,基于零。如果没有指定,默认为第一列。

trans-unit.source: Combines one or more images into a single image. The grayscale value of the pixels of each image in the sequence is assigned in order to the specified channels of the combined image. The typical ordering would be image 1 => Red, 2 => Green, 3 => Blue, etc.
trans-unit.target: 将一个或多个图像合并为一个图像。将序列中每个图像的像素的灰度值分配给组合图像的指定通道。典型的排序为图像1 =>红色，2 =>绿色，3 =>蓝色等。

trans-unit.source: Comfortability method for setting image size. The method sets the image size and allows setting x,y coordinates where the new area begins. This method is available if Imagick has been compiled against ImageMagick version 6.3.1 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 设置图像大小的舒适性方法。该方法可以设置图像的大小,并允许设置新区域开始的x、y坐标。如果Imagick是根据ImageMagick 6.3.1或更新的版本编译的,则此方法可用。

trans-unit.source: Comma separated list of classes to disable within the sandbox sub-interpreter. This list need not contain the names of the currently disabled classes, they will remain disabled whether listed here or not.
trans-unit.target: 要在沙盒子解释器中禁用的类的逗号分隔列表。该列表不需要包含当前禁用的类的名称,无论是否在此列出,它们都将保持禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Comma separated list of functions to disable within the sandbox sub-interpreter. This list need not contain the names of the currently disabled functions, they will remain disabled whether listed here or not.
trans-unit.target: 逗号分隔的沙盒子解释器中要禁用的功能列表。该列表不需要包含当前禁用的功能名称,无论是否在此列出,它们都将保持禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Comma separated list of variables to be treated as superglobals within the sandbox sub-interpreter. These variables will be used in addition to any variables defined internally or through the global runkit.superglobal setting.
trans-unit.target: 逗号分隔的变量列表,这些变量将在沙盒子解释器中被视为超级全局变量。除了内部定义的变量或通过全局 runkit.superglobal 设置定义的变量外,还将使用这些变量。

trans-unit.source: Comma-delimited list of arguments for the newly-created method
trans-unit.target: 新创建的方法的参数列表,以逗号分隔。

trans-unit.source: Comma-delimited list of arguments for the redefined method
trans-unit.target: 重新定义的方法的参数列表,以逗号分隔。

trans-unit.source: Commenting an image and retrieving the comment:
trans-unit.target: 对图像进行评论并检索评论。

trans-unit.source: Commits a transaction that was begun with sqlsrv_begin_transaction(). The connection is returned to auto-commit mode after sqlsrv_commit() is called. The transaction that is committed includes all statements that were executed after the call to sqlsrv_begin_transaction(). Explicit transactions should be started and committed or rolled back using these functions instead of executing SQL statements that begin and committ/roll back transactions. For more information, see » SQLSRV Transactions.
trans-unit.target: 提交以sqlsrv_begin_transaction（）开始的事务。调用sqlsrv_commit（）后，连接将返回到自动提交模式。提交的事务包括在调用sqlsrv_begin_transaction（）之后执行的所有语句。应该使用这些函数来启动和提交显式事务，或者使用这些函数来回滚显式事务，而不是执行开始和提交/回滚事务的SQL语句。有关更多信息，请参见»SQLSRV Transactions。

trans-unit.source: Commits a transaction without closing it.
trans-unit.target: 承诺交易,但不结束交易。

trans-unit.source: Commits a transaction, returning the database connection to autocommit mode until the next call to PDO::beginTransaction() starts a new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 提交事务，使数据库连接返回到自动提交模式，直到下一次调用PDO :: beginTransaction（）开始新事务。

trans-unit.source: Commits all pending transactions on the connection.
trans-unit.target: 提交连接上所有待处理的交易。

trans-unit.source: Commits the current transaction for the database connection.
trans-unit.target: 提交数据库连接的当前事务。

trans-unit.source: Commonly a regular path in your filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 常见的是文件系统中的常规路径。
将 priority1 与 priority2 进行比较。

trans-unit.source: Compare value of attribute with value of same attribute in an LDAP directory entry.
trans-unit.target: 比较 value 的 attribute LDAP目录中的条目有相同属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Compare images and display the reconstructed image
trans-unit.target: 比较图像并显示重建后的图像

trans-unit.source: Compare two Unicode strings according to collation rules.
trans-unit.target: 根据整理规则比较两个Unicode字符串。

trans-unit.source: Compares array1 against array2 and returns the difference. Unlike array_diff() the array keys are also used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 将 array1 与 array2 比较并返回差值。与array_diff（）不同，数组键也用于比较中。

trans-unit.source: Compares array1 against array2 and returns the difference. Unlike array_diff() the array keys are used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 将 array1 与 array2 比较并返回差值。与array_diff（）不同，数组键用于比较。

trans-unit.source: Compares array1 against one or more other arrays and returns the values in array1 that are not present in any of the other arrays.
trans-unit.target: 将 array1 与一个或多个其他数组进行比较，并返回 array1 中其他任何数组中不存在的值。

trans-unit.source: Compares an image to a reconstructed image and returns the specified distortion metric.
trans-unit.target: 将图像与重建图像进行比较,并返回指定的失真度量。

trans-unit.source: Compares each image the GIF disposed forms of the previous image in the sequence. From this it attempts to select the smallest cropped image to replace each frame, while preserving the results of the animation. This method is available if Imagick has been compiled against ImageMagick version 6.2.9 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 比较每个图像的GIF处置形式的序列中的前一个图像。它试图从中选择最小的裁剪图像来替换每一帧,同时保留动画的结果。如果Imagick是根据ImageMagick 6.2.9或更新的版本编译的,则此方法可用。

trans-unit.source: Compares each image with the next in a sequence and returns the maximum bounding region of any pixel differences it discovers.
trans-unit.target: 将每个图像与序列中的下一个图像进行比较,并返回其发现的任何像素差异的最大边界区域。

trans-unit.source: Compares each image with the next in a sequence and returns the maximum bounding region of any pixel differences it discovers. This method is available if Imagick has been compiled against ImageMagick version 6.2.9 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 将每个图像与序列中的下一个图像进行比较,并返回发现的任何像素差异的最大边界区域。如果Imagick是根据ImageMagick 6.2.9或更新的版本编译的,则此方法可用。

trans-unit.source: Compares one or more image channels of an image to a reconstructed image and returns the specified distortion metric.

trans-unit.source: Consider the problem of matching a string in parentheses, allowing for unlimited nested parentheses. Without the use of recursion, the best that can be done is to use a pattern that matches up to some fixed depth of nesting. It is not possible to handle an arbitrary nesting depth. Perl 5.6 has provided an experimental facility that allows regular expressions to recurse (among other things). The special item (?R) is provided for the specific case of recursion. This PCRE pattern solves the parentheses problem (assume the PCRE_EXTENDED option is set so that white space is ignored): \( ( (?>[^()]+) | (?R) )* \)
trans-unit.target: 考虑匹配括号中的字符串，允许无限嵌套括号的问题。在不使用递归的情况下，最好的方法是使用与某个固定嵌套深度匹配的模式。无法处理任意的嵌套深度。Perl 5.6提供了一种实验功能，该功能允许正则表达式进行递归（除其他外）。为递归的特定情况提供了特殊项（？R）。此PCRE模式解决了括号问题（假定设置了PCRE_EXTENDED选项，以便忽略空格）：\（（（（？> [^（）] +）|（？R））* \）

trans-unit.target: 例如，将模式\ d + foo应用于主题行123456bar

trans-unit.source: Constants may only evaluate to scalar values. A typical example is: Mozilla/4.5 [en] (X11; U; Linux 2.2.9 i586). Among other things, you can use this value with get_browser() to tailor your page's output to the capabilities of the user agent.

trans-unit.source: Cookies must be deleted with the same parameters as they were set with. If the value argument is an empty string, or FALSE, and all other arguments match a previous call to setcookie, then the cookie with the specified name will be deleted from the remote client. This is internally achieved by setting value to 'deleted' and expiration time to one year in past.
trans-unit.target: Cookies必须使用与设置时相同的参数删除。如果value参数是一个空字符串或 FALSE ，并且所有其他参数都与对setcookie的先前调用匹配，那么具有指定名称的cookie将从远程客户端中删除。这是通过将值设置为“已删除”并将过期时间设置为过去一年来在内部实现的。

trans-unit.source: Cookies names can be set as array names and will be available to your PHP scripts as arrays but separate cookies are stored on the user's system. Consider explode() to set one cookie with multiple names and values. It is not recommended to use serialize() for this purpose, because it can result in security holes.
trans-unit.target: Cookie名称可以设置为数组名称，并且PHP脚本可以将其作为数组使用，但是单独的Cookie存储在用户的系统上。考虑explode（）设置一个具有多个名称和值的cookie。不建议为此使用serialize（），因为它可能导致安全漏洞。

trans-unit.source: Cookies will not become visible until the next loading of a page that the cookie should be visible for. To test if a cookie was successfully set, check for the cookie on a next loading page before the cookie expires. Expire time is set via the expire parameter. A nice way to debug the existence of cookies is by simply calling print_r($_COOKIE);.
trans-unit.target: 直到下一次加载该cookie的页面加载时，cookie才可见。要测试是否成功设置了cookie，请在cookie过期之前在下一个加载页面上检查cookie。过期时间是通过 expire 参数设置的。调试cookie存在的一种不错的方法是简单地调用print_r（$ _ COOKIE）;。。

trans-unit.source: Copy results from the internal mysqlnd buffer into the PHP variables fetched. By default, mysqlnd will use a reference logic to avoid copying and duplicating results held in memory. For certain result sets, for example, result sets with many small rows, the copy approach can reduce the overall memory usage because PHP variables holding results may be released earlier (available with mysqlnd only, since PHP 5.6.0)
trans-unit.target: 将结果从mysqlnd内部缓冲区复制到获取的PHP变量中。默认情况下,mysqlnd会使用引用逻辑来避免复制和重复保存在内存中的结果。对于某些结果集,例如有许多小行的结果集,复制的方法可以减少整体的内存使用量,因为持有结果的PHP变量可能会更早地被释放(只适用于mysqlnd,从PHP 5.6.0开始)。

trans-unit.source: Create a Socket resource, and bind it to the provided AddrInfo resource. The return value of this function may be used with socket_listen().
trans-unit.target: 创建一个Socket资源，并将其绑定到提供的AddrInfo资源。该函数的返回值可以与socket_listen（）一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Create a Socket resource, and connect it to the provided AddrInfo resource. The return value of this function may be used with the rest of the socket functions.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个Socket资源,并将其连接到提供的AddrInfo资源。这个函数的返回值可以和其他的socket函数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Create a buffer event on a socket, stream or a file descriptor. Passing NULL to socket means that the socket should be created later, e.g. by means of EventBufferEvent::connect() .
trans-unit.target: 在套接字，流或文件描述符上创建一个缓冲区事件。将 NULL 传递给 socket 意味着该套接字应稍后创建，例如，通过EventBufferEvent :: connect（）。

trans-unit.source: Create a kernel from a builtin in kernel. See http://www.imagemagick.org/Usage/morphology/#kernel for examples. Currently the 'rotation' symbols are not supported. Example: $diamondKernel = ImagickKernel::fromBuiltIn(\Imagick::KERNEL_DIAMOND, "2");
trans-unit.target: 从内置的内核中创建一个内核。参见 http://www.imagemagick.org/Usage/morphology/#kernel 获取示例。目前不支持 "旋转 "符号。例如:$diamondKernel=ImagickKernel::fromBuiltIn(\Imagick::KERNEL_DIAMOND,"2")。

trans-unit.source: Create a kernel from an 2d matrix of values. Each value should either be a float (if the element should be used) or 'false' if the element should be skipped. For matrices that are odd sizes in both dimensions the the origin pixel will default to the centre of the kernel. For all other kernel sizes the origin pixel must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 从一个二维数值矩阵中创建一个内核。每一个值都应该是一个float(如果该元素被使用)或者是'false'(如果该元素被跳过)。对于两个维度都是奇数的矩阵,原点像素将默认为内核的中心。对于所有其他尺寸的核,必须指定原点像素。

trans-unit.source: Create a new RegexIterator which filters an Iterator using a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的RegexIterator，它使用正则表达式过滤Iterator。

trans-unit.source: Create a new SSL buffer event to send its data over another buffer event
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的SSL缓冲区事件,将其数据发送到另一个缓冲区事件上。

trans-unit.source: Create a new image and display it.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的图像并显示它。

trans-unit.source: Create a new image from GD file or URL.
trans-unit.target: 从GD文件或URL创建一个新的图像。

trans-unit.source: Create a new image from GD2 file or URL.
trans-unit.target: 从GD2文件或URL创建一个新的图像。

trans-unit.source: Create a new image from a given part of GD2 file or URL.
trans-unit.target: 从GD2文件或URL的指定部分创建一个新的图像。

trans-unit.source: Create a new iterator from an ArrayObject instance.
trans-unit.target: 从ArrayObject实例创建一个新的迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Create an array containing a range of elements.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个包含一系列元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: Create and open for reading and writing; otherwise it has the same behavior as 'x'.
trans-unit.target: 创建并开放供阅读和写作；否则，其行为与'x'相同。

trans-unit.source: Create and open for writing only; place the file pointer at the beginning of the file. If the file already exists, the fopen() call will fail by returning FALSE and generating an error of level E_WARNING. If the file does not exist, attempt to create it. This is equivalent to specifying O_EXCL|O_CREAT flags for the underlying open(2) system call.
trans-unit.target: 创建并开放供写作；将文件指针放在文件的开头。如果文件已经存在，则fopen（）调用将失败，返回 FALSE 并生成级别为 E_WARNING 的错误。如果该文件不存在，请尝试创建它。这等效于为基础open（2）系统调用指定O_EXCL | O_CREAT标志。

trans-unit.source: Create and return a new anonymous function from given callable using the current scope. This method checks if the callable is callable in the current scope and throws a TypeError if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 使用当前范围从给定的 callable 创建并返回一个新的匿名函数。该方法检查该 callable 是在当前的范围可调用并抛出一个类型错误，如果它不是。

trans-unit.source: Create and return a new anonymous function with the same body and bound variables as this one, but possibly with a different bound object and a new class scope.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的匿名函数，该函数具有与此主体相同的主体和绑定变量，但可能具有不同的绑定对象和新的类范围。

trans-unit.source: Create images, set and get the iterator index
trans-unit.target: 创建图像,设置并获取迭代器索引。

trans-unit.source: Create instance of a stopped EvCheck watcher
trans-unit.target: 创建一个已停止的EvCheck监控器实例

trans-unit.source: Create new session, or re-initialize existing session. Called internally by PHP when a session starts either automatically or when session_start() is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 创建新会话，或重新初始化现有会话。当会话自动启动或调用session_start（）时，由PHP内部调用。

trans-unit.source: Create stopped EvSignal watcher object. Unlike EvSignal::__construct() , this method does't start the watcher automatically.
trans-unit.target: 创建停止的EvSignal观察者对象。与EvSignal :: __ construct（）不同，此方法不会自动启动观察程序。

trans-unit.source: Create, and optionally lock a new Mutex for the caller
trans-unit.target: 为调用者创建并有选择地锁定一个新的Mutex。

trans-unit.source: Creates EvCheck object associated with the current event loop instance.
trans-unit.target: 创建与当前事件循环实例相关联的EvCheck对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates EvChild object associated with the current event loop.
trans-unit.target: 创建与当前事件循环相关联的EvChild对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates EvFork watcher object associated with the current event loop instance
trans-unit.target: 创建与当前事件循环实例相关联的EvFork观察者对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates EvIdle watcher object associated with the current event loop instance
trans-unit.target: 创建与当前事件循环实例相关联的EvIdle观察者对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates EvPeriodic watcher object associated with the current event loop instance
trans-unit.target: 创建与当前事件循环实例相关联的EvPeriodic Watcher对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates EvPrepare watcher object associated with the current event loop instance
trans-unit.target: 创建与当前事件循环实例相关联的EvPrepare观察者对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates EvSignal watcher object associated with the current event loop instance
trans-unit.target: 创建与当前事件循环实例相关联的 EvSignal Watcher 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates EvStat watcher object associated with the current event loop instance
trans-unit.target: 创建与当前事件循环实例相关联的EvStat观察者对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates EvStat watcher object, but doesn't start it automatically(unlike EvStat::__construct() ).
trans-unit.target: 创建EvStat观察者对象，但不会自动启动它（不同于EvStat :: __ construct（））。

trans-unit.source: Creates EvTimer stopped watcher object. Unlike EvTimer::__construct() , this method doesn't start the watcher automatically.
trans-unit.target: 创建EvTimer停止的观察者对象。与EvTimer :: __ construct（）不同，此方法不会自动启动观察程序。

trans-unit.source: Creates EvTimer watcher object associated with the current event loop instance
trans-unit.target: 创建与当前事件循环实例相关联的EvTimer观察者对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates SSL context holding pointer to SSL_CTX (see the system manual).
trans-unit.target: 创建指向SSL_CTX的 SSL上下文保存指针（请参见系统手册）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a CURLFile object, used to upload a file with CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个CURLFile对象，该对象用于使用 CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS 上传文件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a DOMDocument object of the specified type with its document element.
trans-unit.target: 使用其document元素创建指定类型的DOMDocument对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GearmanClient instance representing a client that connects to the job server and submits tasks to complete.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GearmanClient实例，该实例表示连接到作业服务器并提交要完成的任务的客户端。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GearmanJob instance representing a job the worker is to complete.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GearmanJob实例，代表该工人要完成的工作。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GearmanTask instance representing a task to be submitted to a job server.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GearmanTask实例，该实例表示要提交给作业服务器的任务。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GearmanWorker instance representing a worker that connects to the job server and accepts tasks to run.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GearmanWorker实例，该实例表示连接到作业服务器并接受要运行的任务的工作程序。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GMP number from an integer or string.
trans-unit.target: 从一个整数或字符串中创建一个GMP编号。

trans-unit.source: Creates a Memcached instance representing the connection to the memcache servers.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个Memcached实例,代表与memcache服务器的连接。

trans-unit.source: Creates a PDO instance to represent a connection to the requested database.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个PDO实例来表示与请求的数据库的连接。
从规则中创建一个翻译器。

trans-unit.source: Creates a composite image by combining several separate images. The images are tiled on the composite image with the name of the image optionally appearing just below the individual tile.
trans-unit.target: 通过合并几个独立的图像来创建一个合成图像。这些图像在合成图像上铺设了瓷砖,图像的名称可以选择出现在单个瓷砖的下面。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of a GearmanClient object.
Creates a copy of a SolrDocument object. Not to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个SolrDocument对象的副本。不直接调用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the node.
Creates a copy of the worker.
Creates a directory on the remote file server with permissions set to mode.
trans-unit.target: 在远程文件服务器上创建目录，权限设置为 mode 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a file with a unique filename, with access permission set to 0600, in the specified directory. If the directory does not exist or is not writable, tempnam() may generate a file in the system's temporary directory, and return the full path to that file, including its name.
trans-unit.target: 在指定目录中创建一个文件名唯一的文件，访问权限设置为0600。如果该目录不存在或不可写，则tempnam（）可能会在系统的临时目录中生成一个文件，并将该文件的完整路径（包括其名称）返回。

trans-unit.source: Creates a filtered iterator from a RecursiveIterator using the callback to determine which items are accepted or rejected.
trans-unit.target: 使用 callback 从RecursiveIterator创建过滤的迭代器，以确定接受或拒绝哪些项目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a filtered iterator using the callback to determine which items are accepted or rejected.
trans-unit.target: 使用 callback 创建过滤的迭代器，以确定接受或拒绝哪些项目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a fixed size thumbnail by first scaling the image down and cropping a specified area from the center.
trans-unit.target: 通过首先缩小图像并从中心裁剪指定的区域来创建一个固定大小的缩略图。

trans-unit.source: Creates a fixed size thumbnail by first scaling the image up or down and cropping a specified area from the center.
trans-unit.target: 首先将图像向上或向下缩放,然后从中心裁剪指定的区域,从而创建一个固定大小的缩略图。

trans-unit.source: Creates a horizontal mirror image by reflecting the pixels around the central y-axis while rotating them 270-degrees. This method is available if Imagick has been compiled against ImageMagick version 6.2.9 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 通过将像素围绕中心y轴反射并旋转270度来创建水平镜像。如果 Imagick 是根据 ImageMagick 6.2.9 或更新的版本编译的,则可使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a horizontal mirror image by reflecting the pixels around the central y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 通过反射中心y轴周围的像素来创建水平镜像。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new DateTimeImmutable object with modified timestamp. The original object is not modified.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个具有修改后的时间戳的新DateTimeImmutable对象。原始对象未修改。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new DOMComment object. This object is read only. It may be appended to a document, but additional nodes may not be appended to this node until the node is associated with a document. To create a writeable node, use DOMDocument::createComment.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的DOMComment对象。该对象是只读的。可以将其附加到文档，但是在该节点与文档关联之前，不得将其他节点附加到该节点。要创建可写节点，请使用DOMDocument :: createComment。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new DOMElement object. This object is read only. It may be appended to a document, but additional nodes may not be appended to this node until the node is associated with a document. To create a writeable node, use DOMDocument::createElement or DOMDocument::createElementNS.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的DOMElement对象。该对象是只读的。可以将其附加到文档，但是在该节点与文档关联之前，不得将其他节点附加到该节点。要创建可写节点，请使用DOMDocument :: createElement或DOMDocument :: createElementNS。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new DOMProcessingInstruction object. This object is read only. It may be appended to a document, but additional nodes may not be appended to this node until the node is associated with a document. To create a writeable node, use DOMDocument::createProcessingInstruction.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的DOMProcessingInstruction对象。该对象是只读的。可以将其附加到文档，但是在该节点与文档关联之前，不得将其他节点附加到该节点。要创建可写节点，请使用DOMDocument :: createProcessingInstruction。
创建一个新的DOMText对象。
创建一个新的DOMXPath对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new XMLWriter using uri for the output.
trans-unit.target: 使用 uri 为输出创建一个新的XMLWriter。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new XMLWriter using memory for string output.
trans-unit.target: 使用内存用于字符串输出创建一个新的XMLWriter。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new Condition Variable for the caller.
trans-unit.target: 为调用者创建一个新的条件变量。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new DOMAttr object. This object is read only. It may be appended to a document, but additional nodes may not be appended to this node until the node is associated with a document. To create a writable node, use DOMDocument::createAttribute.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的DOMAttr对象。该对象是只读的。可以将其附加到文档，但是在该节点与文档关联之前，不得将其他节点附加到该节点。要创建可写节点，请使用DOMDocument :: createAttribute。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new RegexIterator that filters all entries whose key starts with 'test'.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的RegexIterator，以过滤其键以' test ' 开头的所有条目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new RegexIterator that filters all entries with where the array key starts with 'test'.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的RegexIterator,过滤所有数组键以'test'开头的条目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new RegexIterator that filters all strings that start with 'test'.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的RegexIterator,过滤所有以'test'开头的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new SSL buffer event to send its data over an SSL on a socket.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的SSL缓冲区事件,通过套接字上的SSL发送数据。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new SplFileInfo object for the file_name specified. The file does not need to exist, or be readable.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的 file_name 创建一个新的 SplFileInfo 对象。该文件不需要存在,也不需要可读。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new deque using a callable to determine which values to include.
trans-unit.target: 使用Callable创建一个新的双端队列，以确定要包括的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new image and associates ImagickPixel value as background color
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的图像并将ImagickPixel值作为背景色。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new image that is a copy of an existing one with the image pixels "imploded" by the specified percentage.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的图像,该图像是现有图像的副本,并按指定的百分比 "内爆 "图像像素。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new image using ImageMagick pseudo-formats.
trans-unit.target: 使用ImageMagick伪格式创建一个新图像。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new image with the specified background color
trans-unit.target: 用指定的背景色创建一个新的图像。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of Collator.
Creates a new instance of the class without invoking the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在不调用构造函数的情况下创建一个新的类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the class, the given arguments are passed to the class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的类的实例,给定的参数被传递给类的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the class. The given arguments are passed to the class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的类的实例。给定的参数会传递给类的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance using a given key and value.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的 key 和 value 创建一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance, using either a traversable object or an array for the initial values.
trans-unit.target: 使用可遍历的对象或初始 values 的数组创建一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new mailbox specified by mailbox.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个由 mailbox 指定的新信箱。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new map containing keys of the current instance as well as another map, but not of both.
trans-unit.target: 创建包含当前实例的键以及其他新的地图 map ，而不是两个。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new map containing the pairs of the current instance whose keys are also present in the given map. In other words, returns a copy of the current instance with all keys removed that are not also in the other map.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个包含当前实例对的新映射，这些实例的键也存在于给定 map 。换句话说，返回当前实例的副本，其中所有键都已删除，而这些键也不在另一个 map 中。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new map that contains the pairs of the current instance as well as the pairs of another map.
trans-unit.target: 创建包含当前实例的对，还有对彼此的新地图 map 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new map using a callable to determine which pairs to include.
trans-unit.target: 使用Callable创建新地图，以确定要包括的对。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new regular expression iterator.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的正则表达式迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sequence using a callable to determine which values to include.
trans-unit.target: 使用可调用对象来确定要包括的值来创建新序列。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new set containing values in the current instance as well as another set, but not in both.
trans-unit.target: 创建包含当前实例值一组新的以及另一 set ，但不同时。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new set that contains the values of the current instance as well as the values of another set.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新集合，其中包含当前实例的值以及另一个 set 的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new set using a callable to determine which values to include.
trans-unit.target: 使用可调用对象来确定要包括的值来创建一个新集合。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new set using values common to both the current instance and another set. In other words, returns a copy of the current instance with all values removed that are not in the other set.
trans-unit.target: 使用当前实例和另一个 set 公共值创建一个新集。换句话说，返回当前实例的副本，其中删除了所有不在另一个 set 中的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new set using values that aren't in another set.
trans-unit.target: 使用不在另一个集合中的值创建一个新的集合。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new vector using a callable to determine which values to include.
trans-unit.target: 使用Callable创建一个新的向量以确定要包括的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a prefix/ns context for the next XPath query. In particular, this is helpful if the provider of the given XML document alters the namespace prefixes. registerXPathNamespace will create a prefix for the associated namespace, allowing one to access nodes in that namespace without the need to change code to allow for the new prefixes dictated by the provider.
trans-unit.target: 为下一个XPath查询创建一个前缀/ ns上下文。特别是，如果给定XML文档的提供者更改了名称空间前缀，这将很有帮助。registerXPathNamespace将为关联的名称空间创建一个前缀，从而允许人们访问该名称空间中的节点，而无需更改代码以允许提供者指定新的前缀。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle filled with color in the given image starting at point 1 and ending at point 2. 0, 0 is the top left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: 在给定 image 创建一个填充有 color 的矩形，该矩形从点1开始到点2结束。0，0是图像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Creates a regular expression for a case insensitive match.
trans-unit.target: 为不区分大小写的匹配创建一个正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a simulated three-dimensional button-like effect by lightening and darkening the edges of the image. Members width and height of raise_info define the width of the vertical and horizontal edge of the effect.
trans-unit.target: 通过使图像边缘变亮和变暗来创建模拟的三维按钮效果。raise_info的成员width和height定义了效果的垂直和水平边缘的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Creates a special or ordinary file.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个特殊或普通文件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a stopped instance of EvPrepare watcher. Unlike EvPrepare::__construct() , this method doesn' start the watcher automatically.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个已停止的EvPrepare监视程序实例。与EvPrepare :: __ construct（）不同，此方法不会自动启动观察程序。

trans-unit.source: Creates a stream or datagram socket on the specified local_socket.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的 local_socket 上创建流或数据报套接字。

trans-unit.source: Creates a sub-deque of a given range.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个给定范围的子节点。

trans-unit.source: Creates a sub-sequence of a given range.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个给定范围的子序列。

trans-unit.source: Creates a sub-set of a given range.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个给定范围的子集。

trans-unit.source: Creates a sub-vector of a given range.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个给定范围的子向量。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symbolic link named link on the remote filesystem pointing to target.
trans-unit.target: 在指向 target 的远程文件系统上创建一个名为 link 的符号链接。

trans-unit.source: Creates a temporary file with a unique name in read-write (w+) mode and returns a file handle .
trans-unit.target: 在读写(w+)模式下创建一个具有唯一名称的临时文件,并返回一个文件句柄。

trans-unit.source: Creates a timer that will send a SIGALRM signal to the process after the given number of seconds. Any call to pcntl_alarm() will cancel any previously set alarm.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个计时器，该计时器将在给定的秒数后将 SIGALRM 信号发送到进程。对pcntl_alarm（）的任何调用都会取消任何先前设置的警报。

trans-unit.source: Creates a vertical mirror image by reflecting the pixels around the central x-axis while rotating them 90-degrees. This method is available if Imagick has been compiled against ImageMagick version 6.2.9 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 通过围绕中心X轴反射像素并将其旋转90度来创建垂直镜像。如果 Imagick 是根据 ImageMagick 6.2.9 或更新的版本编译的,则可使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a vertical mirror image by reflecting the pixels around the central x-axis.
trans-unit.target: 通过反射中心X轴周围的像素来创建一个垂直镜像。

trans-unit.source: Creates an IntlCalendar object either from a DateTime object or from a string from which a DateTime object can be built.
trans-unit.target: 从DateTime对象或可从中构建DateTime对象的字符串创建IntlCalendar对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates an SplFileObjectobject of the file. This is useful because SplFileObject contains additional methods for manipulating the file whereas SplFileInfo is only useful for gaining information, like whether the file is writable.
trans-unit.target: 创建文件的SplFileObject 对象。这很有用，因为SplFileObject包含用于处理文件的其他方法，而SplFileInfo仅用于获取信息（例如文件是否可写）。

trans-unit.source: Creates an array by using the values from the keys array as keys and the values from the values array as the corresponding values.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个阵列通过使用从所述的值 keys 阵列作为键，并从该值 values 阵列作为相应的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates an HTML document from the DOM representation. This function is usually called after building a new dom document from scratch as in the example below.
trans-unit.target: 从DOM表示中创建一个HTML文档。这个函数通常在从头开始创建一个新的dom文档后调用,如下面的例子。

trans-unit.source: Creates an Imagick instance for a specified image or set of images.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的图像或图像集创建一个Imagick实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates an LDAP link identifier and checks whether the given host and port are plausible.
trans-unit.target: 创建LDAP链接标识符，并检查给定的 host 和 port 是否合理。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML document from the DOM representation. This function is usually called after building a new dom document from scratch as in the example below.

trans-unit.target: 根据用户定义的类 original 创建一个名为 alias 的别名。别名类与原始类完全相同。

trans-unit.target: 从闭包中创建一个匿名的Threaded对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates an anonymous function from the parameters passed, and returns a unique name for it.
trans-unit.target: 从传递的参数中创建一个匿名函数,并为其返回一个唯一的名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates an array containing variables and their values.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个包含变量及其值的数组。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个数组。阅读有关数组类型的部分，以了解有关什么是数组的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Creates an initialization vector (IV) from a random source.
trans-unit.target: 从随机源创建一个初始化向量(IV)。

trans-unit.target: 创建与当前EvLoop对象关联的EvEmbed观察程序的实例。

trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的事件资源。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a socket resource, also referred to as an endpoint of communication. A typical network connection is made up of 2 sockets, one performing the role of the client, and another performing the role of the server.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个套接字资源,也称为通信端点。一个典型的网络连接是由2个套接字组成的,一个扮演客户端的角色,另一个扮演服务器的角色。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a stream context with any options supplied in options preset.
trans-unit.target: 使用 options 预设中提供的任何选项创建并返回流上下文。

trans-unit.source: Creates new connection listener associated with an event base.
trans-unit.target: 创建与事件库关联的新连接监听器。

trans-unit.source: Creates the specified directory on the FTP server.
trans-unit.target: 在FTP服务器上创建指定的 directory 。

trans-unit.source: Creating a copy of an object with fully replicated properties is not always the wanted behavior. A good example of the need for copy constructors, is if you have an object which represents a GTK window and the object holds the resource of this GTK window, when you create a duplicate you might want to create a new window with the same properties and have the new object hold the resource of the new window. Another example is if your object holds a reference to another object which it uses and when you replicate the parent object you want to create a new instance of this other object so that the replica has its own separate copy.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个具有完全复制属性的对象的副本并不总是我们想要的行为。一个很好的例子是,如果你有一个代表GTK窗口的对象,并且这个对象持有这个GTK窗口的资源,当你创建一个副本时,你可能想创建一个具有相同属性的新窗口,并且让新对象持有新窗口的资源。另一个例子是,如果你的对象持有对它使用的另一个对象的引用,当你复制父对象时,你想创建一个新的这个另一个对象的实例,这样副本就有了自己独立的副本。
用方括号语法创建/修改

trans-unit.target: 将图像裁剪到给定的矩形区域，然后返回生成的图像。给定的 image 未修改。

裁剪出一个白色的背景。

trans-unit.source: Curly braces may also be used, to clearly delimit the property name. They are most useful when accessing values within a property that contains an array, when the property name is made of mulitple parts, or when the property name contains characters that are not otherwise valid (e.g. from json_decode() or SimpleXML).
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用大括号，以清楚地界定属性名称。当访问包含数组的属性中的值，属性名称由多个部分组成或属性名称包含其他无效字符（例如，来自json_decode（）或SimpleXML）时，它们最有用。

trans-unit.source: Current Local and Master values for PHP directives. See also ini_get().
trans-unit.target: PHP指令的当前Local和Master值。另请参见ini_get（）。

trans-unit.source: Current session module does not handle unstable network well. You should manage session ID to avoid lost session by session_regenerate_id.
trans-unit.target: 当前的session模块不能很好地处理不稳定的网络。你应该通过session_regenerate_id来管理session ID以避免丢失session。

trans-unit.source: Current session_regenerate_id does not handle unstable network well. e.g. Mobile and WiFi network. Therefore, you may experience lost session by calling session_regenerate_id.
trans-unit.target: 目前的session_regenerate_id不能很好地处理不稳定的网络,例如移动和WiFi网络。因此,调用session_regenerate_id可能会导致会话丢失。

trans-unit.source: Current working directory is changed with some SAPIs if session is closed in the script termination. It is possible to close the session earlier with session_write_close().
trans-unit.target: 如果在脚本终止中关闭了会话，则使用某些SAPI会更改当前工作目录。可以使用session_write_close（）提前关闭会话。

trans-unit.source: Currently only one flag is supported for mode: EIO_FALLOC_FL_KEEP_SIZE (the same as POSIX constant FALLOC_FL_KEEP_SIZE).
trans-unit.target: 当前，模式仅支持一个标志： EIO_FALLOC_FL_KEEP_SIZE （与POSIX常量 FALLOC_FL_KEEP_SIZE 相同）。

trans-unit.source: Currently the "@" error-control operator prefix will even disable error reporting for critical errors that will terminate script execution. Among other things, this means that if you use "@" to suppress errors from a certain function and either it isn't available or has been mistyped, the script will die right there with no indication as to why.
trans-unit.target: 目前,"@"错误控制操作符前缀甚至会禁用关键错误的错误报告,从而终止脚本执行。其中,这意味着如果你使用"@"来抑制某个函数的错误,而它不是不可用,就是被打错了,脚本就会死在那里,没有任何迹象表明原因。

trans-unit.source: Currently the only legal value is "simple"
trans-unit.target: 目前唯一的法律价值是 "简单"

trans-unit.source: Currently there is only one hint available "top_fc", which stands for top level FieldCache
trans-unit.target: 目前只有一个提示 "top_fc",代表顶级的FieldCache。

trans-unit.source: Currently, mode is ignored and is always "rb". This is due to the fact that zip support in PHP is read only access.
trans-unit.target: 当前， mode 被忽略，并且始终为“ rb”。这是由于以下事实：PHP中的zip支持是只读访问。
